Test sceario: Verify that the user can navigate to the "Jewelry" section, select one or more items, and add them successfully to the shopping cart.
Test steps:
click on jewelry tap then click add to cart on all products But we found a product that is not available for purchase
, only for rent. 
We choose the rental period and set the period from October 10 to November 10.

Elegant Gemstone Necklace (rental)
Flower Girl Bracelet
Vintage Style Engagement Ring

Actual Result:
The products were placed in the shopping cart
, but we encountered a problem with one of the products (Elegant Gemstone Necklace)
, which is that this product cannot be purchased,
 only rented, but it was placed in the shopping cart.
